title: SIR7 Men's Slim Fit Stretch Dress Shirt Solid Color Microelastic Long Sleeve Casual Soft Business Button Up Shirts
description: Design: Lightweight, breathable, and soft fabric. Tailored fit with a simple design. Solid color with slight elasticity. A long-sleeve shirt suitable for any occasion
Size: Simple and regular fit design. The appropriate sizes fit most people. Choose your usual size to solve most issues. If you have a larger belly, selecting one size up would be more suitable
Easy Care: Machine wash or hand wash with similar colors. Do not bleach. Low iron
Occasions: Our shirts are suitable for all occasions, such as business, work, office, wedding, party, prom, concert, dating, casual, and more
Color Aberration: Different computer screens can display different colors even if it is the same color. Please allow for reasonable color differences
